name: Quickie Quesadilla
description: There isn’t much that’s easier to make on a weeknight than quesadillas. Spread your favourite Epicure dip on the tortillas, top with cheese and beans, fold and bake until warm and gooey. Leftovers are great in lunchboxes. Kids love cold pizza, so they’ll love cold quesadillas if they don’t have the option to heat them up at school. Get dunkin’ and serve with Guacamole and Salsa.
preparation: Preheat oven to 400° F (205° C). Arrange tortillas on a Sheet Pan lined with a Sheet Pan Liner.
Spread dip on half of each of the tortillas. Top with beans and cheese, then fold tortillas over filling.
Bake for 10 minutes or until cheese has melted and tortillas are starting to turn brown. Cut each quesadilla into wedges and serve.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1⁄2 cup salsa, 1 cup veggies and 2 tbsp prepared Epicure dip.

products.name: 3 Onion Dip Mix
summary: These onions won’t make you cry—they’re pure happiness in a jar! Save time (and tears) on chopping and use this blend anytime you’re looking for the robust flavour of onions, chives, and scallions. Take it way beyond the dip bowl and use 3 Onion as a sauce or seasoning for eggs, veggies, burgers, tacos, and more!

products.name: Sheet Pan
summary: Lightweight all-purpose baking sheet made from a single piece of aluminum, with a one-inch rim.

products.name: Sheet Pan Liner
summary: Nonstick silicone baking sheet. Ideal for baking, roasting, sheet pan meals & more!
